zone: Western Bahr el Ghazal (غرب بحر الغزال)
circumstances: Shortly after takeoff, while in initial climb, the aircraft collided with a flock of birds. Engines n°3 & 4 failed and the crew elected to make an emergency landing in an open field. The aircraft crash landed in a field and came to rest, bursting into flames. All five occupants were injured along with a young boy in the nearby field.
probable_cause: Engine failure during initial climb following a bird strike.
